form.label: ZPA (Zscaler Private Access)
form.description: This dashboard is used to summarize how you could interact with ZPA

search.query: index=* sourcetype="zscaler:api:zpa" | stats latest(_time) as _time | eval earliest = round(relative_time(_time,"-24h")) | rename _time as latest

panel.title: Application segment

search.query: index=* sourcetype="zscaler:api:zpa" source="zscalerapi:zpa:segment_groups:*" | stats count by id, name | sort 0 name
index=* sourcetype="zscaler:api:zpa" source="zscalerapi:zpa:server_groups" | stats count by id, name | sort 0 name

panel.html:
How to create an application segment ?
Name: $app_segment_create_name$
Domain names/IPs (separated by ","): $app_segment_create_domain_names$
$app_segment_create_port_type_field$ ports (separated by "," by pair*): $app_segment_create_ports$
Bypass type: $app_segment_create_bypass_type$
Segment group ID: $app_segment_create_segment_group_id$
Server group IDs: $app_segment_create_server_group_ids$
Description: $app_segment_create_description$
For optional parameters, you can use the same command by following the same pattern for input fields
*: if you specify "A,B,C,D", it will use those ranges: [A-B] and [C-D]
Create an application segment using this command: (Ref: app_segments.py#L61)
| makeresults | eval name = "$app_segment_create_name$", domain_names = "$app_segment_create_domain_names$", $app_segment_create_port_type$_ports = "$app_segment_create_tcp_ports$", bypass_type = "$app_segment_create_bypass_type$", segment_group_id = "$app_segment_create_segment_group_id$", server_group_ids = "$app_segment_create_server_group_ids$", description = "$app_segment_create_description$" | sendalert zscaler_zpa_action param.account_name="$account$" param.action="create_app_segment"

search.query: index=* sourcetype="zscaler:api:zpa" source="zscalerapi:zpa:app_segments" | stats count by id, name | sort 0 name

b.i: How to update an application segment ?

ul.li: For optional parameters, you can use the same command by following the same pattern for input fields

html.p: Update an application segment using this command: (here, only the name and description) (Ref: app_segments.py#L150)
| makeresults | eval segment_id = "$app_segment_update_app_segment_id$" | sendalert zscaler_zpa_action param.account_name="$account$" param.action="update_app_segment"

search.query: index=* sourcetype="zscaler:api:zpa" source="zscalerapi:zpa:app_segments" | stats count by id, name | sort 0 name

b.i: How to delete an application segment ?

html.p: Delete an application segment using this command: (Ref: app_segments.py#L44)
| makeresults | eval segment_id = "$app_segment_delete_app_segment_id$" | sendalert zscaler_zpa_action param.account_name="$account$" param.action="delete_app_segment"
